asgn1SoccerCompetition

Interface SportsLeague

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoccerLeague

    public interface SportsLeague
    A general purpose interface to model a sporting league.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alan Woodley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsTeam(java.lang.String name)
      Specifies if a team with the given official name is registerd to the league.
      void displayLeagueTable()
      Displays a ranked list of the teams in the league to the screen.
      void endSeason()
      Ends the season.
      int getRegisteredNumTeams()
      Gets the number of teams currently registered to the league.
      int getRequiredNumTeams()
      Gets the number of teams required for the league to begin its season which is also the maximum number of teams that can be registered to a league.
      boolean isOffSeason()
      Specifies if the league is in the off season (i.e.
      void playMatch(java.lang.String homeTeamName, int homeTeamPoints, java.lang.String awayTeamName, int awayTeamPoints)
      Plays a match in a specified league between two teams with the respective points.
      void sortTeams()
      Sorts the teams in the league.
      void startNewSeason()
      Starts a new season by reverting all statistics for each team to initial values.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegisteredNumTeams

        int getRegisteredNumTeams()
        Gets the number of teams currently registered to the league.
        Returns:
        the current number of teams registered.

      • getRequiredNumTeams

        int getRequiredNumTeams()
        Gets the number of teams required for the league to begin its season which is also the maximum number of teams that can be registered to a league.
        Returns:
        The number of teams required by the league/maximum number of teams in the league.

      • startNewSeason

        void startNewSeason()
             throws LeagueException
        Starts a new season by reverting all statistics for each team to initial values.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if the number of registered teams does not equal the required number of teams or if the season has already started

      • endSeason

        void endSeason()
        throws LeagueException
        Ends the season.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if season has not started

      • isOffSeason

        boolean isOffSeason()
        Specifies if the league is in the off season (i.e. when matches are not played).
        Returns:
        True If the league is in its off season, false otherwise.

      • playMatch

        void playMatch(java.lang.String homeTeamName,
               int homeTeamPoints,
               java.lang.String awayTeamName,
               int awayTeamPoints)
        throws LeagueException
        Plays a match in a specified league between two teams with the respective points. After each match the teams are resorted
        Parameters:
        homeTeamName - The name of the home team.
        homeTeamPoints - The number of points scored by the home team.
        awayTeamName - The name of the away team.
        awayTeamPoints - The number of points scored by the away team.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - If the season has not started or if both teams have the same official name.

      • displayLeagueTable

        void displayLeagueTable()
        Displays a ranked list of the teams in the league to the screen.

      • sortTeams

        void sortTeams()
        Sorts the teams in the league.

      • containsTeam

        boolean containsTeam(java.lang.String name)
        Specifies if a team with the given official name is registerd to the league.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a team.
        Returns:
        True if the team is registered to the league, false otherwise.
